name: Claudia's Spy (18+ Adult Visual Novel)
description:
KDT Prod is an amateur studio offering a new small visual novel once a month. Each month, you will discover a new game with a new story. It can be related to the previous game or not. The decision is ours !

We are currently a team of 3

  • KDT is in charge of art and code
  • Scrambled_letters works on code and scenario
  • Cap'tain Kcid deals with the script. 

We'll improve the gameplay regularly and try to enrich our dialogues. Thank you for your support and your valuable feedbacks ! 

Thank you to all the contributors. We need you to produce a new free game every month for the Claudia's Spy  is a hobby project but we would not be against a little help. Support us on Patreon to access a :

  • New game every month
  • Uncensored version
  • Last game with no delay

Follow @KDTprod for monthly updates !
